pkgmetadata.longdescription: Matrix Reconstruction from a Few Entries // Matrix reconstruction, also known as matrix completion, is the task of inferring missing entries of a partially observed matrix. This package provides a method called OptSpace, which was proposed by Keshavan, R.H., Oh, S., and Montanari, A. (2009) doi:10.1109/ISIT.2009.5205567 for a case under low-rank assumption.
